JOIN bank b ON c.code = b.currency_code

AND c.code_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{codeName}, '%')

GROUP BY c.code, c.code_name, c.country_name
ORDER BY c.country_name ASC
ORDER BY c.code_name ASC
ORDER BY c.code ASC
